channel.title: The Muffin Faction (Joke Faction)
channel.description:
The Muffin Faction is a new evil faction that somehow found their way into a castle called Adiart. These guys really like muffins.
(it is a Cultseen style faction)
#### Faction Exclusive Investigative Class: > ## [color=steblue]Cupcake Fanatic[/color] > [color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigative[/color] >**Remove Muffins (Night)** - Determine if a player is a member of the Muffin faction. >**Cupcake Magic (Night)** - Target a player, if they get killed by The Weremuffin or Muffin Man, you will kill the attacker - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to remove all muffins from the game, oh and Neutral Killers because apparently they like muffins.*
Game spawns with Muffin Man and Weremuffin
### The Main Converter: > ## [color=tan]The Muffin Man[/color] > [color=tan]Muffin Special[/color] >**Did somebody say the muffin man? (Passive)** - You will be occupy immune as you are the muffin man >**Muffinbox (Day)** - trollbox reskin >**Cook Muffins (Night)** - Feed a player muffins, converting them to the Muffin Faction. - Infinite uses >**Bomb Muffins (Night)** - Kill a player, can only be used if there are no Weremuffins living. - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme*
## Converts: > ## [color=tan]The Weremuffin[/color] > [color=tan]Muffin Killing[/color] >**Poison Muffin (Day)** - Feed a player a poisonous muffin, they will die in 2 nights and their portrait will not be changed, they will be able to hear a faint voice say "Do you like muffins?" at night. - 3 uses (cannot use unless you are oldest living Weremuffin) >**awoooo (Night)** - Kill a player tonight. - Infinite uses (cannot use unless you are oldest living Weremuffin) >**The Big Muffin (Night)** - Block anyone from visiting target player of Muffin - 2 uses > *Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme*
> Converts from Knight, Hunter and Mercenary
> ## [color=tan]The Banana Muffin[/color] > [color=tan]Muffin Support[/color] > **Bananas can't bleed (Passive)** - Immune to bleeding. >**Poison Muffin (Day)** - Target player will believe that they were Muffin poisoned and will get a fake heal message tonight. - 1 use >**Muffined Barrier (Night)** - If a muffin player is attacked or bled, you can heal them - 2 uses >**Demuffin (Night)** - If target dies, their class will show up as this. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme*
> Converts from Court Wizard and Physician
> ## [color=tan]The Chocolate Muffin[/color] > [color=tan]Muffin Investigative[/color] >**Poison Muffin (Day)** - See who your target is following tonight - Infinite uses >**Magical Muffin Glasses (Night)** - View a player's class type - Unlimited uses >**Muffin Hourglass (Night)** - Show target player's exact class. - 2 uses > *Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme*
> Converts from Cupcake Fanatic, Observer and Princess
> ## [color=tan]The Tasty Muffin[/color] > [color=tan]Muffin Offensive[/color] >**Prepared (Passive)** - You are occupy immune as you are used to people trying to eat you. >**Attack That Idiot (Day)** - Disable a target's day abilities, cannot be used on Prince - 1 use >**I cooked Muffins for you. (Night)** - Occupy a player - Unlimited uses >**Cakebauch (Night)** - Force the player to target you, you will be immune to attacks redirected, you will also show up as BD to any investigative searches you redirect - Infinite uses > *Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme*
> Converts from Drunk and Butler
> ## [color=tan]The Talking Muffin[/color] > [color=tan]Muffin Social[/color] >**Too OP Muffin pls nerf (Day)** - Do not meet up with the other muffin members and imprison a player for the night, they will believe it is the Prince - 1 use >**Muffin Announce (Day)** - Say a message, it will show as Telepathy. - 2 uses >**Muffin Spy (Night)** - You will be able to read whispers to and from your target, cannot target King - Unlimited uses >**Muffinbend (Night)** - Target will get the wrong results > *Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme*
> Converts from Noble and Mystic
#### **You are only a Magic User if you were one before conversion**
If The Muffin Man dies, the oldest non-killing Muffin member will take the position. If there are only Weremuffins, the oldest one will become the Muffin man.
There is a maximum of 4 muffin members at a time.

item.title: The Muffin Faction (Joke Faction)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Pug:

Too OP Muffin pls nerf (Night) - Do not meet up with the other muffin members and imprison a player for the night, they will believe it is the Prince - 1 use

So half way through the night I get teleported into jail. I wonder if it’s prince or not

Read full topic

item.title: The Muffin Faction (Joke Faction)

item.description:
Pug:

Too OP Muffin pls nerf (Night) - Do not meet up with the other muffin members and imprison a player for the night, they will believe it is the Prince - 1 use

I really like this faction as a whole. Also I would love an ability like this to mimic the prince for a night. Good job!

item.title: The Muffin Faction (Joke Faction)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Pug:

Prepared (Passive) - You are occupy immune as you are used to people trying to eat you.

Poor muffin. But wait… is the cupcake the monster here? Is he trying to eat the muffin…Or is he working with someone else… because there is no way that a cupcake can beat the muffin faction…

Read full topic

item.title: The Muffin Faction (Joke Faction)
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
The Muffin Faction is a new evil faction that somehow found their way into a castle called Adiart. These guys really like muffins.

(it is a Cultseen style faction)

Faction Exclusive Investigative Class:

Cupcake Fanatic

Blue Dragon Investigative
Remove Muffins (Night) - Determine if a player is a member of the Muffin faction.
Cupcake Magic (Night) - Target a player, if they get killed by The Weremuffin or Muffin Man, you will kill the attacker - Infinite uses
Your goal is to remove all muffins from the game, oh and Neutral Killers because apparently they like muffins.

Game spawns with Muffin Man and Weremuffin

The Main Converter:

The Muffin Man

Muffin Special
Did somebody say the muffin man? (Passive) - You will be occupy immune as you are the muffin man
Muffinbox (Day) - trollbox reskin
Cook Muffins (Night) - Feed a player muffins, converting them to the Muffin Faction. - Infinite uses
Bomb Muffins (Night) - Kill a player, can only be used if there are no Weremuffins living. - Infinite uses
Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme

Converts:

The Weremuffin

Muffin Killing
Poison Muffin (Day) - Feed a player a poisonous muffin, they will die in 2 nights and their portrait will not be changed, they will be able to hear a faint voice say “Do you like muffins?” at night. - 3 uses (cannot use unless you are oldest living Weremuffin)
awoooo (Night) - Kill a player tonight. - Infinite uses (cannot use unless you are oldest living Weremuffin)
The Big Muffin (Night) - Block anyone from visiting target player of Muffin - 2 uses
Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme

Converts from Knight, Hunter and Mercenary

The Banana Muffin

Muffin Support
Bananas can’t bleed (Passive) - Immune to bleeding.
Poison Muffin (Day) - Target player will believe that they were Muffin poisoned and will get a fake heal message tonight. - 1 use
Muffined Barrier (Night) - If a muffin player is attacked or bled, you can heal them - 2 uses
Demuffin (Night) - If target dies, their class will show up as this. - 2 uses
Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme

Converts from Court Wizard and Physician

The Chocolate Muffin

Muffin Investigative
Poison Muffin (Day) - See who your target is following tonight - Infinite uses
Magical Muffin Glasses (Night) - View a player’s class type - Unlimited uses
Muffin Hourglass (Night) - Show target player’s exact class. - 2 uses
Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme

Converts from Cupcake Fanatic, Observer and Princess

The Tasty Muffin

Muffin Offensive
Prepared (Passive) - You are occupy immune as you are used to people trying to eat you.
Attack That Idiot (Day) - Disable a target’s day abilities, cannot be used on Prince - 1 use
I cooked Muffins for you. (Night) - Occupy a player - Unlimited uses
Cakebauch (Night) - Force the player to target you, you will be immune to attacks redirected, you will also show up as BD to any investigative searches you redirect - Infinite uses
Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme

Converts from Drunk and Butler

The Talking Muffin

Muffin Social
Too OP Muffin pls nerf (Day) - Do not meet up with the other muffin members and imprison a player for the night, they will believe it is the Prince - 1 use
Muffin Announce (Day) - Say a message, it will show as Telepathy. - 2 uses
Muffin Spy (Night) - You will be able to read whispers to and from your target, cannot target King - Unlimited uses
Muffinbend (Night) - Target will get the wrong results
Your goal is to tell everyone that Muffins reign supreme

Converts from Noble and Mystic

You are only a Magic User if you were one before conversion

If The Muffin Man dies, the oldest non-killing Muffin member will take the position.
If there are only Weremuffins, the oldest one will become the Muffin man.

There is a maximum of 4 muffin members at a time.

Read full topic
